abstract.t: This document describes a new Port Control Protocol (PCP) option called THIRD_PARTY_ID. It is designed to be used in combination with the THIRD_PARTY option specified in RFC 6887 but can also be used without it. The THIRD_PARTY_ID serves to identify a Third Party in situations where a third party's IP address contained in the THIRD_PARTY option does not provide sufficient information to create requested mappings in a PCP-controlled device.
